skills.name: Fury of the North
skills.blurb: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage. Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.
description: {{sbc|Innate - Frost Armor:}} '''Sejuani''' receives [[File:Sejuani Frost Armor.png|18px|link=]] ''Frost Armor'' if she hasn't taken damage from enemy {{tip|champions}} or {{tip|monsters}} in the last 12 seconds, lingering for 3 seconds after taking damage from them.

[[File:Sejuani Frost Armor.png|18px|link=]] ''Frost Armor'' engulfs {{ui|Bristle}} in True Ice, granting '''Sejuani''' {{tip|slow-immune|slow immunity}}, {{tip|cripple-immune|cripple immunity}}, {{sti|armor|{{as|10 (+ 50% '''bonus''' armor) '''bonus''' armor}}}}, and {{sti|mr|{{as|10 (+ 50% '''bonus''' magic resistance) '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Icebreaker:}} Enemies {{tip|stun|stunned}} by '''Sejuani''' become ''Frozen'' for the disable's duration. '''Sejuani's''' next [[basic attack]] or [[champion ability|ability]] against a ''Frozen'' enemy will consume the effect to deal them {{as|10% of their {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}} as {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, capped at 300 against epic monsters.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Frost Armor: Sejuani receives File:Sejuani Frost Armor.png Frost Armor if she hasn't taken damage from enemy champions or monsters in the last 12 seconds, lingering for 3 seconds after taking damage from them.
File:Sejuani Frost Armor.png Frost Armor engulfs Bristle in True Ice, granting Sejuani slow immunity, cripple immunity, 10 (+ 50% bonus armor) bonus armor, and 10 (+ 50% bonus magic resistance) bonus magic resistance.
Innate - Icebreaker: Enemies stunned by Sejuani become Frozen for the disable's duration. Sejuani's next basic attack or champion ability against a Frozen enemy will consume the effect to deal them 10% of their maximum health as bonus magic damage, capped at 300 against epic monsters.
skills.notes:
* Gaining ''Frost Armor'' does not remove any pre-existing {{tip|slow|slows}} or {{tip|cripple|cripples}}.
* ''Icebreaker'' will not trigger if the basic attack is {{tip|blocked}}.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Icebreaker's '' interactions with {{tip|dodge|dodging}} and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects via basic attack.
* {{Pending for test}}: {{tip|Spell shield}} interaction with ''Icebreaker''.

skills.name: Arctic Assault
skills.blurb: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sejuani''' signals {{ui|Bristle}} to {{tip|dash}} to the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies in her path and {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for 1 second. The charge will prematurely end upon colliding with an enemy {{tip|champion}}.
'''Sejuani''' can cast any of her [[champion ability|abilities]] during ''Arctic Assault''.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sejuani signals Bristle to dash to the target location, dealing magic damage to all enemies in her path and knocking them up for 1 second. The charge will prematurely end upon colliding with an enemy champion.
Sejuani can cast any of her champion ability during Arctic Assault.
skills.notes:
* Champions will slightly be {{tip|airborne|knocked back}}, while [[minion]]s and [[monster]]s will instead be slightly {{tip|airborne|pulled}} for a fixed distance.
* ''Arctic Assault'' cannot {{tip|airborne|knock}} enemies over terrain.
* Casting {{si|Flash}} during ''Arctic Assault'' will end the dash and affect enemies at the new location.

skills.name: Winter's Wrath
skills.blurb: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{fd|0.25}} seconds into the cast time, '''Sejuani''' swings her flail in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies within and {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} all {{tip|minion|minions}} and {{tip|monster|monsters}} hit.

'''Sejuani''' then lashes out with her flail after the remaining {{fd|0.75}} seconds of the cast time in a line in the same direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies struck and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 75% for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
'''Sejuani''' can move while casting ''Winter's Wrath''. Both swings will strike in the cast direction, but their hitboxes follow '''Sejuani's''' movement.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: After 0.25 seconds into the cast time, Sejuani swings her flail in a cone in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies within and knocking back all minions and monsters hit.
Sejuani then lashes out with her flail after the remaining 0.75 seconds of the cast time in a line in the same direction, dealing physical damage to enemies struck and slowing them by 75% for 0.25 seconds.
Sejuani can move while casting Winter's Wrath. Both swings will strike in the cast direction, but their hitboxes follow Sejuani's movement.
leveling: {{st|Swing Damage|{{ap|20 to 40}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|(+ 2% of her '''maximum''' health)}}}}
{{st|Lash Damage|{{ap|30 to 190}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} {{as|(+ 6% of her '''maximum''' health)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|20+30 to 40+190}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}} {{as|(+ 8% of her '''maximum''' health)}}}}
skills.notes: * {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage - either the swing or the lash.

effects.str: • Swing Damage: (+ 20% AP) (+ 2% of her maximum health)

st_slices: (+ 20% AP) (+ 2% of her maximum health)

effects.str:
• Lash Damage: (+ 60% AP) (+ 6% of her maximum health)
  • Total Damage: (+ 80% AP) (+ 8% of her maximum health)

st_slices: (+ 60% AP) (+ 6% of her maximum health)
(+ 80% AP) (+ 8% of her maximum health)

skills.name: Permafrost
skills.blurb: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} {{ai|Winter's Wrath|Sejuani}} and both '''Sejuani's''' and nearby allied {{tip|melee}} champions' basic attacks apply ''Frost'' to enemy {{tip|champion|champions}}, medium / large {{tip|monster|monsters}} and large {{tip|minion|minions}} for 5 seconds, stacking up to 4 times and refreshing on subsequent attacks from them.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Sejuani''' hurls a trap at the {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy with 4 stacks of ''Frost'' closest to the cursor, which upon arrival consumes all stacks to deal them {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|knockdown|knock them down}}, and {{tip|stun}} them for 1 second.
Enemy champions {{tip|stun|stunned}} by '''Sejuani''' cannot gain ''Frost'' for 8 seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Sejuani's Winter's Wrath and both Sejuani's and nearby allied melee champions' basic attacks apply Frost to enemy champions, medium / large monsters and large minions for 5 seconds, stacking up to 4 times and refreshing on subsequent attacks from them.
Active: Sejuani hurls a trap at the visible enemy with 4 stacks of Frost closest to the cursor, which upon arrival consumes all stacks to deal them magic damage, knock them down, and stun them for 1 second.
Enemy champions stunned by Sejuani cannot gain Frost for 8 seconds.
Permafrost resets Sejuani's basic attack timer.
skills.notes:
* ''Permafrost's'' targerting prioritizes champions within 50 of cursor, then non-champions within 50 of cursor, then champions within 350 of cursor, then closest unit to cursor within 2500 (this only applies if there is no target directly under the cursor).
* ''Frost'' stacks will not be applied if the basic attack is {{tip|blocked}}.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Permafrost's'' stack application interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodge}}, {{tip|blind}}).

skills.name: Glacial Prison
skills.blurb: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sejuani''' throws an ice bola in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for 1 second.

Upon reaching maximum range or colliding with an enemy champion after traveling over 400 units, the bola deals increased damage and instead {{tip|stun|stuns}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, and creates a frost storm at the surrounding area for 2 seconds which forms a glacier on the ground that {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies within by 30% and grants {{tip|sight}} of the area in a smaller radius.

At the end of the duration, the glacier shatters, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 80% for 1 second as well as {{tip|sight|revealing}} them and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
The enemy hit by the bola is not affected by the storm's effects.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sejuani throws an ice bola in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing them magic damage and stunning them for 1 second.
Upon reaching maximum range or colliding with an enemy champion after traveling over 400 units, the bola deals increased damage and instead stuns for 1.5 seconds, and creates a frost storm at the surrounding area for 2 seconds which forms a glacier on the ground that slows enemies within by 30% and grants sight of the area in a smaller radius.
At the end of the duration, the glacier shatters, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and slowing them by 80% for 1 second as well as revealing them and granting sight of the area for 0.5 seconds.
The enemy hit by the bola is not affected by the storm's effects.
skills.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} to the primary target and {{tip|area damage}} to secondary targets in the ice storm.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage.
* ''Glacial Prison'' will cast from wherever '''Sejuani''' is at the end of the cast time.
* Both areas of effect will be centered on the first champion struck, not at the location the missile collided with them.

effects.str: • Increased Magic Damage: (+ 80% AP)
